code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec maximum_number_of_string_pairs(words :: [String.t]) :: integer
  def maximum_number_of_string_pairs(words) do
    reversed_map = create_reversed_map(words)

    Enum.reduce(words, 0, fn word, acc ->
      reversed_word = String.reverse(word)
      if Map.has_key?(reversed_map, reversed_word) and Map.get(reversed_map, reversed_word) > 0 do
        new_map = Map.update!(reversed_map, reversed_word, &(&1 - 1))
        acc + 1
      else
        acc
      end
    end) 
  end

  defp create_reversed_map(words) do
    Enum.reduce(words, %{}, fn word, acc ->
      Map.update(acc, String.reverse(word), 1, &(&1 + 1))
    end)
  end
end
